documentation_sources.relevance: Documents OAuth consent configuration and Drive-specific scope requirements for Google Drive integrations

documentation_sources.relevance: Complete Drive API v3 REST resource catalog with method definitions, endpoints, and discovery metadata

documentation_sources.relevance: Comprehensive Airtable REST reference covering authentication, record operations, formulas, metadata API, webhooks, rate limits, and integration patterns

documentation_sources.name: Airtable Metadata API
documentation_sources.relevance: Summarizes schema discovery and modification endpoints for bases, tables, and fields with permission requirements

documentation_sources.relevance: Catalog of Airtable formula operators and functions grouped by use case for building record-level calculations
